note: Escapee from the birdy hellsite and loving it so far. Be kind and spread some happiness.  We live in the Highlands of Scotland and have two cocker spaniels and two cats. About to be a Grannie and Grandalf for the first time. Into baking and knitting (not very good at either), Strictly, reading and walking my dogs.  I work in higher education at Scotland’s progressive university. All views my own ❤️ she/her/hers 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿🇪🇺🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️
